name: Glow In The Dark
description:
Average NSA agent doing their job to prevent people from being secure.

But in the internet, you can not trust to anyone. Even yourself.

So you need to be careful for possible threads aiming you.

Especially when you are a security agent "protecting your nation."

Developer Note:

  • We highly recommend you to play the game by installing it, 
  • If you are going to play it in the browser, click on the "Fullscreen" button.

You can report the bugs and feedbacks to us via commenting!

Made with 💖 for Boğaziçi Game Jam 2022.
